text: Bakubuza mayelana nokulwa enyangeni engcwele ithi â€œukulwa kuyona (kuyiphutha elikhulu) kodwa nokuvimbela (abantu) endleleni kaMvelinqangi nokungakholelwa kuyena (nokuvimbela abantu ukuthi baye) naseMasjid Al-Haraam nokuxosha abantu bayo kukhona (iphutha) elikhulu emehlweni kaMvelinqangi futhi ukungakholwa kungaphezulu kokubulala futhi bazoqhubeka nokulwa nani kuze kube yilapho beniphindisela emumva baniyekise inkolo yenu uma bekwazile.
